en.deemedServiceAppStatusMsg: You can continue with your divorce
en.deemedServiceAppStatusMsgDetails1: The court has accepted your application for 'deemed service'. This means it accepts that your {{ case.divorceWho }} received the application, and you don't need their response to proceed.
en.deemedServiceAmendedAppStatusMsgDetails1: The court has accepted your application for 'deemed service'. This means it accepts that your {{ case.divorceWho }} received the amended application, and you don't need their response to proceed.
en.deemedServiceAppStatusMsgDetails2: This means that you can now continue with your divorce as if they had responded.

cy.deemedServiceAppStatusMsg: [CY] You can continue with your divorce
cy.deemedServiceAppStatusMsgDetails1: [CY] The court has accepted your application for 'deemed service'. This means it accepts that your {{ case.divorceWho }} received the application, and you don't need their response to proceed.
cy.deemedServiceAmendedAppStatusMsgDetails1: [CY] The court has accepted your application for 'deemed service'. This means it accepts that your {{ case.divorceWho }} received the amended application, and you don't need their response to proceed.
cy.deemedServiceAppStatusMsgDetails2: [CY] This means that you can now continue with your divorce as if they had responded.
